about_the_game:
Kingdom Ascension is a medieval-themed strategy war game where you step into the role of a lord, starting from scratch to build your kingdom. Collect resources, construct buildings, recruit troops, explore, and embark on adventures to expand your territory and defend your homeland.

Build Your Territory

Begin on barren base, collecting essential resources like food and materials for troop training, building upgrades, and technological research. Efficient allocation of limited resources is critical for success.

Assemble an Army

Form your army to fend off enemy invasions. Recruit different types of soldiers and form your troops according to tactical needs. Troop formations, troop types and tactical arrangements will determine the victory or defeat on the battlefield.

Technology and War Machines

Develop technology to enhance economic growth in scale and efficiency. War machines are pivotal in battles, capable of turning the tide. You must continually upgrade their functionality and tactical applications through research.

Explore and Expand

Send troops to explore the map, uncovering hidden treasures, mysterious ruins, and unknown enemies. Unlock more territories through battles or acquisitions, accumulate more resources, gradually expand your territory and become a party overlord.

Key Features

  • Minimalist Art Style: A fresh and unique visual style offers a distinct gaming experience.

  • Freedom of Development: Diverse construction and upgrade paths allow you to create a truly unique kingdom.

  • Strategic Depth: Balancing resource management, troop formations, and battle strategies challenges your intellect and courage.

  • Dynamic Map: Random events and exploration elements ensure every game is full of surprises and challenges.

In the world of Kingdom Ascension, every decision matters. Become a respected lord, or fall in the chaos of war? The choice is yours!

name: Kingdom Ascension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K | AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 970 (4 GB) | AMD® Radeon™ RX 480 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit | Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-12600K | AMD® Ryzen™ 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ RTX 3080 (10 GB) | AMD® Radeon™ RX 6800 XT (16 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Step into the role of a lord, starting from scratch to build your kingdom. Gather resources, construct buildings, recruit troops, explore, and embark on adventures to continuously expand your territory and defend your homeland.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
